title: udyr noobchmpion :(
body: why people say that udyr is a noob champ i dont think so. Because i think he is very hard to master and not so easy like he seems.{{champion:77}} {{summoner:11}}

replies.body:
Es gibt keine noob champions.

Udyr hat offensichtliche stärken und offensichtliche schwächen, beides muss man zu nutzen wissen.
zum beispiel das er keine einzige ranged fähigkeit aht und das bei solchen leuten wie ezreal und kallista ziemlich problematisch werden kann (meine meinund- von einem unerfahrenen spieler)
thanks guys for the positiv energy :)
Noob champ confirmed ban rate even 3/7 he can still carries.. gg riot

Udyr isn't a noobchamp. Everyone thinks so because he uses "only autoattacks" but still you really need to know when and how to use your stances.
I play him a lot and now since the Runic Echoes he came up again in the meta and I see a lot of Udyr player that really fuck up with him. 

So don't listen to the others :)

He isn't a noobchampion.

You can counter every Champion.

Like Lee and Panth counter him
